title: “I am no man”: For Zelda-playing daughter, dad gives Link a sex change
notes: Article about a dad who modified the hex code for Zelda: Wind Waker to make the game text refer to Link as female. The number of characters needed to match exactly, so he had to rewrite some of sentences.

title: The Great Fire: A Traveling Truck Show
notes: Info about a traveling circus/vaudeville show in 2012 Chicago. They performed out of a truck that they took to different neighborhoods in the city. The show's theme centers around the Great Chicago Fire and explores the city's history, community, and triumph [archived]
